member.name: T:System.Numerics.VectorExtensions
member.summary: Contains conversions from Vector2 to Windows.Foundation.Point and Size, which are all structurally identical.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.VectorExtensions.ToPoint(System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Returns a Point whose coordinates are the same as the vector's.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.VectorExtensions.ToSize(System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Returns a Size whose width and height are equal to the vector's X and Y coordinates.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.VectorExtensions.ToVector2(Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Returns a Vector2 whose coordinates are the same as the Point's.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.VectorExtensions.ToVector2(Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.summary: Returns a Vector2 whose coordinates are the height and width of the Size.
